https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oaykCIfxCAIhizAbKwBx4dwHVPv.jpg Kenichi Horie is determined to challenge his family, the law and the nature crossing the Pacific to America in a small sailboat. Despite his careful planning many unforeseen events will test his determination. Alone on the Pacific
